title: Terminal for Deleting Posts
post: I've added a "terminal" for deleting posts, which will come in handy when *cough* someone XSS's the Hivezine, and you get continuously Rickrolled every time you view the page, and you then also have no way to delete the post.<br><br>You can find the terminal <a href="https://gaehive.vercel.app/terminal">here</a>
